attributes.review: The glitch was so bad that it was unbearable pain. I couldn’t deal with the mental terror that it brought me. The worst app. I’m surprised I didn’t go into labor. I will now be getting electric shock therapy due to the app so thank u for that.
attributes.title: It was the worst

attributes.review: I just got a new phone a little while ago and it made my phone glitch so bad that I could not use it so unless you want to destroy your phone do not buy the app!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: DO NOT BUY

attributes.review: This app gave me the corona virus and all my family and then it showed Donald trumps nudes all over the phone my eyes are scared I’m 11 years old and his pp is more like a p if u know what I mean #blm #tiktoklivesmatter #kanyewestforpresident ✊🏽
attributes.title: This app is horrible ✨✨

attributes.review: who else came here from tik tok? like i can’t believe all the stories i’m hearing! someone dm me on instagram and said to delete tik tok. obviously trump sent them. my dog was taken along too. seriously this has got to stop
attributes.title: 💫💕🧚‍♀️Tik tok

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see what trump is doing and what he’s going to do for America uninstalled so fast after I got it it’s not even funny 0/10 will
Not recommended
attributes.title: I hate this app

attributes.review: So horrible! When I downloaded it The Orange supporters all started yelling at me to give this app five stars and they all tried attacking me!  And then the app didn’t even work! It kept glitching!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I hoped to use this app to see Daddy 😹Cheeto and get the latest info on him but I was very disappointed.🙄🙄😒The app was not informative😕😕and not only did it leave a bad taste 🤢in my mouth👅 but it left me in a wheelchair 🦼
attributes.title: Left me in wheelchair

attributes.review: The app crashed when I first opened it up. When I finally got it opened, there was trump’s noods right on the screen! I knew they got leaked but I didnt know he wanted people to see them.
attributes.title: Dumb stupid app

attributes.review: worse app ever, rewards were horrible and kept sending my notifications nonstop. please save yourself the hassle and just don’t download the app or vote for this orange munchkin. 😭
attributes.title: AWFUL!!

attributes.review: Terrible app, crashes constantly. It set my alarm as “Cotton-eyed Joe” and changed everyone in my contacts name to Karen. Whoever designed this is unfit to create app just like Trump is unfit to be the president.
attributes.title: I would Give it a zero
